meanings: ask[get] a lawyer to defend one's case

vlive.korean: '의뢰인' 본 거 같은데 '어린 의뢰인'? I think I've seen "The Client". "My First Client"? 듣기 View video GFRIEND : 심심한 버디
vlive.english: I think I've seen "The Client". "My First Client"?

vlive.korean: 작사 의뢰 받으셔서 - 혹시 하실 얘기 있습니까? Oh, since you have to write lyrics. - Do you have anything to say to me? 듣기 View video BTS : BTS Live : 제가 왔어요 😗
vlive.english: Oh, since you have to write lyrics. - Do you have anything to say to me?

vlive.korean: 지금 최근 다른 친구의 작사 의뢰를 받았는데 그 노래가 아주... I've been asked to write lyrics by one of our members lately. 듣기 View video BTS : BTS Live : 제가 왔어요 😗
vlive.english: I've been asked to write lyrics by one of our members lately.

vlive.korean: 오늘 의뢰는? Today's client is... 듣기 View video 모비딕(Mobidic) : 최현석을 무릎 꿇게 한 스페셜 게스트는? <초이가이버> 7회
의뢰 내용은? What is the content of the request? 듣기 View video 모비딕(Mobidic) : 편의점 재료만으로 양식을? 최현석 청소 요정으로 이직하다! <초이가이버> 15회
vlive.english: What is the content of the request?

examples.korean: He was accused of soaking his clients. 발음듣기 그는 의뢰인들에게서 많은 돈을 우려낸다는 비난을 받았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was accused of soaking his clients. 발음

examples.korean: He advised his client to plead insanity. 발음듣기 그는 의뢰인에게 정신 이상이라는 답변을 하도록 조언했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He advised his client to plead insanity. 발음

examples.korean: a lawyer with many famous clients 발음듣기 유명한 의뢰인이 많은 변호사 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a lawyer with many famous clients 발음

examples.korean: My client pleads guilty, M’lud. 발음듣기 제 의뢰인은 유죄를 인정합니다, 판사님. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: My client pleads guilty, M’lud. 발음

examples.korean: A contract is prepared in negotiation with our clients. 발음듣기 계약서는 의뢰인들과 협의하여 준비한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: A contract is prepared in negotiation with our clients. 발음
